headline: Wall Street Bulls Look Optimistic About Halliburton (HAL): Should You Buy?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Halliburton (HAL) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?
